Course.Name: Engineer Comp Sci I Lab
Course.Description: The course includes hands-on instruction and laboratory exercises in developing programs written in a high-level object oriented programming language applying the principles taught in the CSCI 1370 lecture course.
Course.Cross-listed: CSCI-1170 (A student may receive credit in only one course)
Course.Course-attributes: Degree Elective, Course fee - Computer Science, CS Instruction Fee - LU
